details.command: python3 train.py --arch resnet20s --dataset CIFAR10 --k ${k} --exp-mode prune --exp-name resnet20s_ratio${k}_adv_auto --trainer adv --val-method adv --resume results/resnet20s/resnet20s_ratio${k}_adv_auto/prune/latest_exp/checkpoint/checkpoint.pth.tar --scaled-score-init --result-dir results --use_trainable_router --router_checkpoint_path results/pretrained/resnet20s_adv_pretrain.pth.tar --router_arch resnet20s
